channel.title: Help
channel.description: howon my server how i make like the server say hi like it would not be me sayin hi it would say server hi

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Xile_Maizez Xile Maizez
item.description:
@Xile_Maizez wrote:

So basicly, you want the chatbox to say “Hi” when they log in or something?..

If so, then open your client.java

And if it doesn’t say anything when you log in, then its gona be a little harder… If it does then press CTRL + F and search for what it does say when you log in. And just edit it so it says “Hello”

Now if it doesn’t say anything when you log, press CTRL + F and search for newWelc, until you find something like this code:

if (playerRights >= 0) { sendMessage("XXX"); sendMessage("XXX"); sendMessage("XXX"); sendMessage("XXX"); sendMessage("XXX"); sendMessage("XXX"); sendMessage("XXX"); newWelc(); }

Just edit the X’s to what you want it to say. Each “sendMessage” is a new line, so you can delete it or add if you want.

Sorry if this was a little confusing, but good luck.

Read full topic
